recipes.cookingMethod: Mix the ground meat with onion, tomato paste, parsley, and spices. Roll out the dough and spread the meat mixture over it. Bake in a hot oven for a few minutes until the crust is crispy.

Marinate the chicken breast in olive oil, lemon juice, and spices. Cut the bell pepper and onion into chunks and skewer with the chicken. Grill until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are charred.
Layer the phyllo dough with a mixture of ground walnuts and sugar. Brush each layer with melted butter. Bake until golden brown and crisp. Drizzle with honey syrup while still warm.
